txt.en: You have planted a yellow onion field
You have collected a <rgb=#FF00FF00>fair yellow onion crop</rgb>

'If you wish to learn more about farming, find Bruno Ervinen by the fields. He is a guest from one of the nearby hobbit villages, and is more familiar with these soils than we are. I am sure he would be happy to teach you.

'Good day, [placeholder].'

<rgb=#FF0000>WARNING: You must make sure to have room in your inventory for this quest.</rgb>
You should speak with the Novice Farmhand to learn more about farming and set yourself on a path to good eating.
'You should speak with the Novice Farmhand.'
You have picked a yellow onion

The Novice Farmhand provided you with a <rgb=#FF00FF00>crate</rgb> full of ingredients that you can use to grow the yellow onion. Open the <rgb=#FF00FF00>crate</rgb> to get the ingredients.\n\n<rgb=#FF00FF00>Ingredients for Farmers are normally purchased from vendors or discovered while farming. You can also find ingredients on the Auction Hall.</rgb>
The Novice Farmhand provided you with the ingredients necessary to create a cropï¿½
